content: Property Family HDB BTO EC Condominium Asked by Yvonne IsabelleAsked on 23 Apr 2019Which is better? Getting a BTO flat or a 1 room EC as first property?I just got married, currently deciding between a BTO and a 1 room EC. Are there other new couples out there who has been through this decision before, able to help a fellow new couple out pls ?6 answersAnswerBump1

Nicholas Woon, Marketing Director at ERA Realty Network Pte LtdLevel 4. ProdigyAnswered on 23 Apr 2019BTO!it is cheaper and the capital appreciation potential (in absolute terms) is about the same at 5 years mark! If you manage to get a BTO near MRT, that would be a bonus!0 comments5

HC Tang, Financial Enthusiast, Budgeting at The SocietyLevel 8. WizardUpdated on 26 Jun 2019BTO!Start with BTO and later upgrade to an EC at later times with some profit from sales proceed of BTO will be much managable. It's like we all start small somewhere and scale it later as income increases. There quite a few subsidy we can enjoy with starting income that makes it suitable. If you are not going to upgrade anymore and gonna stay in the EC for the rest of your life , then go for EC if financially is not too taxing for a start to avoid buying / selling cost associated.
